item.title: タッカー・カールソンが新番組「タッカー」の第1話をツイッターに投稿、エピソードは10分強で、メイン州の自宅からのようだ（Dominick Mastrangelo/The Hill）。
item.description:
Dominick Mastrangelo / The Hill:
Tucker Carlson posts the first episode of his new show, Tucker on Twitter; the episode was just over 10 minutes long and appeared to be from his home in Maine  —  Former Fox News host Tucker Carlson released the first episode of his new show on Twitter Tuesday evening.

item.title: [スレッド】ニューヨークタイムズのNewsGuildのメンバー、昇給や妊活などを明記した5年契約の批准に99％以上の賛成を得る(@nytimesguild)
item.description:
@nytimesguild:
[Thread] Members of The New York Times' NewsGuild vote more than 99% in favor of ratifying a five-year contract specifying raises, fertility coverage, and more  —  After nearly 800 days without a contract, ~1,000 @NYTimesGuild members voted more than 99 percent in favor to ratify a new 5-year deal that includes an immediate $65,000 salary floor, raises for every member, hybrid work options, a ban on NDAs and new investments in local news. [image]

item.title: ニューヨークの刑務所を運営する機関は、収監された作家、ジャーナリスト、アーティストが許可なく出版し、報酬を得ることを禁止している（Chris Gelardi/New York Focus)
item.description:
Chris Gelardi / New York Focus:
The agency that runs New York's prisons bans incarcerated writers, journalists, and artists from publishing without permission, and from getting compensation  —  New York prisons may have effectively banned journalism behind bars.  —  The new prison policy prohibits incarcerated people from getting paid for their creative work.

item.title: 英国文化省長官Lucy Frazerは、BBCは時折偏向しているが、具体的な例を挙げることを拒否し、ライセンス料の資金調達モデルを見直す予定であると述べている（Jake Kanter/Deadline）
item.description:
Jake Kanter / Deadline:
UK Culture Secretary Lucy Frazer says the BBC is occasionally biased but refuses to give specific examples and plans to review its license fee funding model  —  The UK's new Culture Secretary has accused the BBC of being biased, but failed to provide a single example of where the broadcaster has broken its commitment to impartiality.

item.title: Apple、iOS 17でNews Plus購読者向けのApple Newsに日替わりクロスワードパズルを追加し、アプリをThe New York Timesとさらに緊密に競争させると発表 (Jay Peters/The Verge)
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Apple says iOS 17 will add daily crossword puzzles to Apple News for News Plus subscribers, putting the app in even closer competition with The New York Times  —  Apple's upcoming iOS 17 update will add daily crossword puzzles to the Apple News app, but only for News Plus subscribers, the company said on its iOS 17 preview website.

CNET updates its AI policy: AI tools won't write entire stories, humans will write hands-on reviews, and the outlet will “explore” using AI for story outlines  —  Months after news broke that tech outlet CNET had quietly begun producing articles with generative AI systems …
